name: Jurassic♥Heart
summary: In your heart of hearts you’ve always wanted it. You know that a T-Rex won’t be a gentle lover, but you want the excitement. The chase. The literal chase of being hunted by a T-Rex. Can you imagine? A dinner date with a Tyrannosaurus Rex. Not knowing whether or not you are on the actual menu. This is Jurassic Heart — the dating simulation that allows you to woo a dinosaur. ——MARK SERRELS
